_source.short_desc: Affordable! Collect Rent Online (Free), Screen Tenants, Full Accounting, Starting at Only $19/month. See testimonials. Get Organized!
_source.long_desc: Affordable! Starting at $19/month, Collect Rent Online (Free ACH), Full Accounting, Tenant Screening. Property Management Software for landlords and property managers. TrueRent is so simple, powerful and affordable. Compare us to others and you will see why TrueRent is the best option to grow your rental business. Designed for landlord and property managers with 10 - 5000 units under management.

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Commercial Property Management
category_features.definition: Add, view, and edit details for commercial, corporate, or hospitality properties that are available for sale or rent

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Financial Management
category_features.definition: Provide a comprehensive overview of organization's finances

category_features.name: Lease Management
category_features.definition: Manage and monitor rental payments, coordinate any tenant alterations, and handle lease amendments

category_features.name: Maintenance Management
category_features.definition: Assess and plan maintenance operations and updates to ensure longevity of physical assets

category_features.name: Property Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database to track details of properties (including lease, tenant, and owner information)

category_features.name: Residential Properties
category_features.definition: Add, view, and edit details for residential properties that are available for sale or rent

category_features.name: Tenant Tracking
category_features.definition: Manage tenant related activities like room booking, rent processing, etc

related_products.short_desc: monday.com is a cloud Work OS, where teams run their projects and everyday work, whether they are in the office, home or on-the-go.
related_products.features: monday.com is a Real Estate Property management software your team will actually enjoy using. It makes it fun and easy for everyone to collaborate, focus on what's important, and get more done at work. It's the first visual software of its kind and shows you exactly where things stand at a single glance. Finally get rid of painfully long email threads, cut down on meetings, and experience the satisfaction of turning things green when they're done.

related_products.short_desc: Buildium is a top-rated cloud-based property management software best suited for residential properties and associations.
related_products.features: Buildium's property management platform makes it possible for managers of residential and association properties to take complete control of every aspect of their business, including mastering their operations, making their residents feel at home, and taking on new doors.  A monthly or annual subscription includes award-winning support from our dedicated customer care team, as well as on-demand help and training.

related_products.short_desc: Complete cloud-based property management software solution for professional residential and mixed-use property managers.
related_products.features: Next generation property management software designed for residential, commercial, homeowner & condo association, student housing, and mixed portfolio property managers with growing, complex businesses. Manage your business at scale with AppFolio's fully mobile, intuitive solution, which includes complete accounting & management functionality, instant access to customizable reports & owner statements, marketing tools, online leasing, tenant screening, and online rent collection and payments.

related_products.short_desc: ResMan's platform is built to seamlessly manage multifamily units, delivering efficient workflows and free live chat support.
related_products.features: If you own, operate or invest in multifamily apartments with more than 100 units then it is time to discover ResMan. ResMan's property management platform seamlessly manages everything from accounting to screening to affordable compliance, giving owners and operators an end-to-end solution that delivers consistent NOI growth and a breathtaking resident experience. || Free Live Chat Support || Easy Implementation || Dedicated Customer Success Team || Visit ResMan's website for a free demo.

related_products.short_desc: From flexible pricing, customization, and best-in-class functionality, our Residential Rental Property Management Software offers more.
related_products.features:
Propertyware, a RealPage company, is a powerful, customizable and open all-in-one software solution designed to help Single Family property management companies run their business their way. Propertyware provides unmatched customization, an open API for two-way data exchange, portfolio-level accounting and reporting, and the industry's only solution for multi-regional expansion and growth allowing managers to easily monitor local operations and see holistic reporting with a single sign on.

Built by single-family experts, Propertyware has been the industry's leading property management platform for almost 20 years for residential rental businesses. Today, we're fortunate to be the software provider for some of the industry's largest and most successful single-family property management companies. For more information, visit www.propertyware.com, and connect with us on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

related_products.short_desc: Quickbase is a no-code operational agility platform that enables organizations to improve operations through insights and automation.
related_products.features: Quickbase's real estate management software allow you to collect and access all information from a single platform. Track projects and key metrics with a variety of report types, maps, calendars, and timelines. Keep track of leases, sales, and work orders across all properties with your management dashboard. Improve operations through real-time insights and automation.

related_products.short_desc: Avail helps landlords find potential tenants, view their credit history, sign leases, and collect rent, all online!
related_products.features: Real estate property management can be challenging, but landlords can save time and relieve stress with Avail - an online tool that combines all of the features and educational content that landlords need to manage their rentals. With Avail, landlords can advertise their rental listings across a dozen sites, screen tenants with customizable questions, request in-depth background checks, create and sign state-specific leases, collect rent, track rental income and expenses, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Rent Manager property management software is for companies-global enterprises and mom-and-pops-that manage all varieties of properties.
related_products.features: Rent Manager is award-winning property management software built for residential, commercial, and short-term-stay portfolios of any size. The program's fully customizable features include a double-entry accounting system, maintenance management/scheduling, marketing integration, mobile applications, more than 450 insightful reports, and an API that integrates with the best PropTech providers in the market.

related_products.short_desc: TenantCloud is a free cloud service with personal portals for Landlords, Tenants, and ServicePros.
related_products.features:
TenantCloud is a rental property accounting and management software that provides Landlords, Tenants and ServicePros with personal portals to manage online rent collection, communication, maintenance requests and more. 

As a multitasking system, TenantCloud includes rental accounting, advertising and invoicing capabilities in addition to tenant screening and application status tracking functionality.

related_products.short_desc: Browser-based property and asset management software providing integrated, comprehensive management and accounting.
related_products.features: Yardi Voyager is a fully-integrated, browser-based, enterprise management system designed specifically for property owners, managers and investors in global real estate markets. The Voyager enterprise management system centralizes accounting and property management data in a single database, enabling up-to-the-minute reports at the click of a button.

related_products.short_desc: Innago is a free, easy-to-use property management software solution, designed to save you time & money. Start managing rentals better.
related_products.features:
Innago is a free, easy-to-use property management software solution, designed to save you time & money. 

Our mission is to make renting simple, accessible, & affordable for landlords of any size. Too many alternatives are expensive & overwhelming, turning a "solution" into a problem. 

Innago allows you to easily: collect rent, screen tenants, list properties, manage work orders, create applications, sign leases, organize financials, communicate with tenants, & much more!

similar_products.short_desc: LABOR DAY SALE: Get 50% off your first 2 months with unlimited support & 30-day money back guarantee. Offer ends Friday September 09.
similar_products.features:
LABOR DAY SALE: Get 50% off your first two months & onboarding by Friday September 09! Get a fully customizable property management software that helps manage your properties from one place. 

Unlimited free training, support, and migration is included. Backed by our "no questions asked" 30-day money back guarantee, you can try it risk-free, no credit card needed.

DoorLoop's award winning software has raised over $10M in funding and is used for tens of thousands of units in over 100 countries.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete cloud-based property management software solution for professional residential and mixed-use property managers.
similar_products.features: Next generation property management software designed for residential, commercial, homeowner & condo association, student housing, and mixed portfolio property managers with growing, complex businesses. Manage your business at scale with AppFolio's fully mobile, intuitive solution, which includes complete accounting & management functionality, instant access to customizable reports & owner statements, marketing tools, online leasing, tenant screening, and online rent collection and payments.

similar_products.short_desc: Entrata is the leading real estate property management operating system for multifamily communities worldwide.
similar_products.features:
Entrata is the leading real estate property management operating system for multifamily communities worldwide. Setting the bar for innovation in property management software since 2003, Entrata offers solutions for every step of the leasing lifecycle and empowers owners, property managers, and renters to create stronger communities. 

Entrata currently serves over three million residents across more than 20,000 multifamily communities around the globe.

similar_products.short_desc: Visual Lease is the #1 lease optimization software provider used by organizations to manage 500,000+ real estate and equipment leases.
similar_products.features: Visual Lease is the #1 lease optimization software provider. Our award-winning software combines decades of lease management experience with robust lease accounting expertise. Used by 1,000+ organizations to manage 500,000+ real estate and equipment leases, we help organizations become compliant with FASB, IFRS and GASB lease accounting standards, while simultaneously improving the financial, legal and operational performance of their leases.

similar_products.short_desc: Yardi Breeze is intuitive property management software that's refreshingly simple to use, saving you both time and money.
similar_products.features: Yardi Breeze is property management software designed for you. Our refreshingly simple platform includes built-in accounting, online marketing and leasing, integrated screening and insurance, and online portals for easy rent collection, service requests, payments and owner reporting. It's easy to set up, and pricing starts at just $1 per unit per month for residential properties. If your business requires additional features and controls, ask about Yardi Breeze Premier.

similar_products.short_desc: Lease accounting solution that helps businesses classify operating and financial leases and create accounting schedules.
similar_products.features: Lucernex is an industry-leading lease management and accounting software. Managing the leases for real estate & equipment involves many complex scenarios. Accruent's lease management software does the heavy lifting for you, helping mitigate risk, achieve compliance, and seamlessly integrate into your existing solutions. Full-service lease administration. Comprehensive lease accounting. Automated compliance with GASB, FASB, IASB, and IFRS. Growth and capital allocations.

similar_products.short_desc: Buildium is a top-rated cloud-based property management software best suited for residential properties and associations.
similar_products.features: Buildium's property management platform makes it possible for managers of residential and association properties to take complete control of every aspect of their business, including mastering their operations, making their residents feel at home, and taking on new doors.  A monthly or annual subscription includes award-winning support from our dedicated customer care team, as well as on-demand help and training.

similar_products.short_desc: Property management software for property managers, landlords and real estate investors. Property management made easy!
similar_products.features: SimplifyEm is much easier to use than spreadsheets and financial applications. You can avoid vacancies and get paid on time with tenant and lease management, save time and money with automated tracking of rental finances, and make tax season easy with one click tax preparation.  Tired of filing cabinets overflowing with paper receipts, complex spreadsheets, and expensive property management software? SimplifyEm.com is your solution.

similar_products.short_desc: MRI Software liberates real estate property management companies that own/manage 100+ units.
similar_products.features: As the pioneer of property management technology, MRI Living provides a comprehensive and flexible set of tools crafted to help you take on today's challenges. Our open and connected technology approach gives you the freedom to choose how to run your real estate business without compromise. Innovative property management software can automate manual processes, save time, and increase productivity for your organization, while meeting the unique accounting, finance and management needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Re-Leased property software is cloud-based commercial property management software, designed for landlords and property managers.
similar_products.features:
Re-Leased property software is a complete cloud-based property management and accounting solution, designed for landlords and property managers of both commercial and mixed property. 

Trusted by thousands of real estate professionals around the world, Re-Leased delivers ease of use, automation of time-intensive tasks, full mobility to work anywhere, data-driven insights, and powerful integrations with best-in-class software such as Xero, QuickBooks Online. Grow your business with Re-Leased.

similar_products.short_desc: Get a OneStop Customer Portal to power your digital branch, engage with customers, and manage your firm- under your brand.
similar_products.features: Moxo powers OneStop Customer Portals, a virtual branch for real estate professionals. Provide business class service on digital channels under your brand. Keep clients engaged and manage your distributed firm. With a fluid collaborative experience built-in, agencies can message securely, host and attend video meetings, centralize and manage disclosures, sign contracts, execute on transactions, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Commercial Real Estate software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Commercial Real Estate tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Commercial Real Estate software is used by commercial real estate agencies for managing their properties and by real estate investors for analyzing ROI on potential purchases.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top HOA software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of HOA tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: HOA software, or Homeowners Association software, is designed for the particular needs of single-family home developments, condominiums (Condos), and other similar communities and homeowner associations with features similar to Property Management and Fund Accounting software. Standard features include the ability to track information about homeowners and condo association participants, create community forums, and manage member meetings. HOA software is related to Membership Management software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospitality Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospitality Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospitality Property Management software automates the marketing, booking and billing of rooms for hotels, motels and resorts. Hotel managers use these applications to optimize the efficiency of their operations, speeding the process of filling and turning over rooms. Hospitality Property Management solutions offer a variety of vacancy monitoring features and integration for marketing and sales tools, as well as billing functions. Management tools for other functions such as maintenance requests and housekeeping schedules are also often included. Hospitality Property Management software is related to Real Estate Property Management software, Rental software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lease Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lease Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lease Management software stores important data about leased property or equipment and also often includes financial or legal information. These applications offer powerful reporting tools while critical date email alarms allow organizations to proactively manage their real estate portfolios, mitigate risk and make more informed business decisions. Lease Management applications also support comprehensive management of the leasing process, tracking the flow of a lease from start to finish, shortening leasing cycle for office, industrial and retail and optimizing profits. Lease Management software is related to Real Estate Agency software and Real Estate Property Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Rental Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Rental Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Rental Property Management software provides financial and tenant tools to property management companies. Most often rental property management software is used to collect rental payments, track expenses, and engage tenants with online communities. Additional tools for property management companies can be found in the Lease Management software, Real Estate Property Management software, Vacation Rental software, and HOA software categories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate Agency software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate Agency tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate Agency software automates business, marketing, and contact management activities for real estate sales and rental organizations. Real Estate Agency solutions manage listings, contacts, and inquiries and publishes property listings to the agency's website. These applications also enable the printing of flyers, catalogs, and reports. Contact management and email management are also common features of these software packages. Real Estate Agency software is related to Lease Management software and Real Estate Property Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate CMA software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate CMA tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate CMA software helps real estate agents create comparative market analysis presentations for their clients.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate CRM software provides specialized customer relationship tools to realty companies. CRM features often include lead management and follow-up, automated email marketing, mobile tools, and sales force automation. Related categories include Customer Relationship Management software, Sales Force Automation software, Contact Management software, Real Estate Agency software, Marketing Automation software, Hospitality Property Management software, Lease Management software, Lead Management software, Real Estate Property Management software, Vacation Rental software, Rental Property Management software, and Mac CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate Transaction Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate Transaction Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate Transaction Management software enables agents to create, share and electronically sign forms and contracts.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Vacation Rental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Vacation Rental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Vacation Rental software is used by property owners of houses, apartments and condos, to manage the reservations and marketing of their properties for vacation goers as an alternative to hotels. These software products are typically also used by companies for Corporate Housing Management to maintain employee schedules in corporate owned properties as an alternative to extended stay hotels. Vacation Rental software is related to Hospitality Property Management software.

Our feature rich but easy-to-use software includes journal entries, required disclosures, lease classification, critical date notifications, option tracking, rent and opex payment management, transaction management, and custom accounting and real estate reporting.

similar_products.features: Lucernex is an industry-leading lease administration and accounting software. Managing the leases for real estate & equipment involves many complex scenarios. Accruent's lease management software does the heavy lifting for you, helping mitigate risk, achieve compliance, and seamlessly integrate into your existing solutions. Full-service lease administration. Comprehensive lease accounting. Automated compliance with GASB, FASB, IASB, and IFRS. Growth and capital allocations.

similar_products.short_desc: Landlord software that lets you manage all your rentals in one place whether you own one property or many.
similar_products.features: Buildium is the only property management software designed by property managers for property managers. Buildium's all-in-one, cloud-based solution allows property managers to be more efficient and take control of every aspect of their business - from leasing and accounting to operations and maintenance. Buildium services more than 14,000 managers of rental properties and associations in 46 countries - totaling over one million units under management.

similar_products.short_desc: LeaseQuery makes accountants' lives easier by simplifying the complex with user-friendly & trustworthy financial accounting solutions.
similar_products.features: LeaseQuery simplifies lessee accounting for ASC 842 & IFRS 16 and lessee & lessor accounting for GASB 87. With amortization schedules, journal entries, and all required disclosure reports, LeaseQuery accounts for any lease including vehicles, equipment & real estate. Our software helps accountants work efficiently, strengthen the audit process, and comply confidently. LeaseQuery integrates with any ERP and has a version built in NetSuite. Best of all, 35+ staff accountants are ready to help you.

Web & mobile apps for landlords to collect rent, list properties, find & screen tenants, manage maintenance, and rental property accounting. Get unlimited properties & live customer support.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospitality Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospitality Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospitality Property Management software automates the marketing, booking and billing of rooms for hotels, motels and resorts. Hotel managers use these applications to optimize the efficiency of their operations, speeding the process of filling and turning over rooms. Hospitality Property Management solutions offer a variety of vacancy monitoring features and integration for marketing and sales tools, as well as billing functions. Management tools for other functions such as maintenance requests and housekeeping schedules are also often included. Hospitality Property Management software is related to Real Estate Property Management software, Rental software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Real Estate Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Real Estate Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Real Estate Property Management software automates back office, financial, and operational tools for real estate property managers. These applications provide rental management software tools for apartments, rental housing, commercial property, mobile home parks, storage facilities and property owner associations and enable users to track tenant information, vacancies, and leasing agreements. Real Estate Property Management solutions enable reporting on revenue generation, operational costs, cash flow, budgeting and forecasting. Real Estate Property Management software is related to Hospitality Property Management software, Lease Management software and Real Estate Agency software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Rental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Rental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Rental software automates business management, record keeping, and accounting for rental businesses, including retail stores and rental property management firms. These applications enable the automation and integration of core business processes such as point of sale (POS), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), accounting and inventory management as well as customer satisfaction tools. Rental software is related to Hospitality Property Management software.
